title: Framelover
author: Framelover
content: I greet Una my seniors and fellow beginners. Make una no vex if this topic no sweet una for body but na as e de do me na im make I see am as a concern nd necessity to address am. Cuz even me wey write this article, my mental health de f**kd up. Mental Health na mathias wey we as Nigerians de overlook, we no de really care about am or take am seriously. This mathias na watyn fit affect person, family, society at large. Many pipu de struggle in silence base on fear say other pipu go use one kain Irene ðŸ‘€ take kpor dem.The major reason why be say mental health awareness dey essential be say e de help to remove stigma wey concern mental health issues and e de help encourage pipu make dem for seek help. This mathias fit go long way in reducing mental health disorders nd make e improve our overall mental health for we country cuz una go agree with me so majority of us no too normal (make we tell ourselves truth).This awareness fit help improve we country productivity nd our quality of life. By dey promote awareness about mental health nd dey encourage pipu make dem seek help wen dem need am, we fit help reduce all these negative effects nd we fit make d overall health nd well being of Nigerians better.Make we try look into this mathias cuz mental health dey really underrated for we country nd na something wey we need to serious about cuz from there, even d change and betterment of d country wey we de talk about go begin workout. Abeg how Una take reason this mathias?I make sentence abi I de cap vatica?Una reason with me say this awareness go actually fit go a long way in helping we country?

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: How many Nigerians go gree pay money to go see therapist to talk about trauma, even to see marriage counselor for advice na problem, many go prefer to go see their pastor. Nigerians know how we take dey heal our pains, many people na memes and twitter trends them dey use forget their problem, na either big brother naija or some other trending show for social media. Right now na Hilda dey trend, everybody dey focused on her for now, by next week we go don move on to something else.

comments.author: Framelover
comments.body: Quote from: SatoPrincess on May 15, 2023, 05:31:29 PMHow many Nigerians go gree pay money to go see therapist to talk about trauma, even to see marriage counselor for advice na problem, many go prefer to go see their pastor. Nigerians know how we take dey heal our pains, many people na memes and twitter trends them dey use forget their problem, na either big brother naija or some other trending show for social media. Right now na Hilda dey trend, everybody dey focused on her for now, by next week we go don move on to something else. E be true say many Naija pipu dey prefer make dem go meet dem pastors or find comfort for popular culture instead of paying money go see therapist or marriage counselor. Memes, Twitter trends, and reality TV shows na e be the way dem dey take forget their problem for some time. But e dey important make we know say some Naija pipu dem dey see d importance of professional help, nd dem dey go see therapist or counselor when dem need am. Even though popular culture fit help dem for small time, therapist go give dem special place make dem fit talk about their problems nd dem go give dem advice wey go fit help dem for long time healing and personal growth. As pipu dey increase their awareness about mental health, e go cause change for their attitude towards therapy nd counseling so more people go fit embrace d benefits wey e dey bring.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Na true talk na Satoprincess yan for here say we Nigerians get our own way wey we dey take handle/heal our mental health challenges and eh dey work for us, because Nigerians na the last set of people to carry money go pay for a session with a therapist to tell them how eh dey do them for body, they rather prefer to go see pastor or herbalist and even pay more. But all thanks to Twitter and all this social media prankstars & content creators @ Untouchable comedy, Emmanulla comedy, Sydney, Taaooma comedyÂ  & e.t.c wey dey give us joy everyday, I bet you the level of mental health for don high more than what it is today.

Abeg make una dey try treat people right for anywhere una find otherselfs because people dey actually go through alot and I dey encourage everybody here to try talk to person if you notice say your own dum dey do you somehow. No dey shame, na talk dem go talk and e dun finish. If you allow shame kill you na ur own cup of tea be dat. Make we dey open up to one another.If your own shame too much then go see doctor. Him fit help you tell you one or twos wey you fit dey use or do to help your mental health. Also try dey exercise and dey chop well. All this time go help you. No be only outside wahala dey cause mental issue. Both your own overthinking dey causes am therefore to eradicate this thing from the country or to reduce am well well to the bare minimum, den we need to put hands together to educate people to dey talk their mind when their own no good so people fit reason them wetin dem go do to reduced the loan wey dem dey carry for head.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Before I join people way dey talk say depression no dey exist until I see problem way pass me. I too don go through depression, this one happen for 2021, thank God for my close friends and family way stay by my side even when I dey para unnecessary for them, dem no vex because them understand say na frustration dey do me. My advice to anybody way dey go through tough times na say make them remember say tough times no go last forever, try find joy for something and focus on that small joy because overthinking dey kill faster than any disease. year

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: One's mental health is very important in any business you are involved in as your ability of reasoning towards a particular topic will aid you in knowing the techniques and the rightful insights to follow.Finding the right solution to problems requires mental awareness as if you're not giving the right solution to problems it also becomes a problem to you as well.Moreover, anything you want to do in life requires the rightÂ  knowledge to be applied towards enhancing your mental ability. When you apply the right knowledge to something it boost your confidence morale. In as much as one is concerned, we are responsible for our actions and inactions and the inability to take responsibility of our actions becomes a state of mental health related challenges and it is advisable to know about the changes we experience in our environment.
